# Your Final Quest: Complete RPG System!

You've learned everything you need. Now prove your mastery by building a complete game system from scratch!

## The Ultimate Challenge

Create a **Complete RPG Character & Quest Management System** using everything you've learned.

### System Requirements:

#### 1. Character Management
- Create characters with: name, class, level, health, mana, strength, intelligence
- Level up characters (increase stats)
- Display character information
- Save/load to JSON

#### 2. Inventory System
- Add items (weapon/armor/potion)
- Remove items by name
- Display inventory sorted by value
- Calculate total inventory worth

#### 3. Quest System
- Load quests from data
- Mark quests as completed
- Track quest rewards
- Calculate completion rate

#### 4. Battle System
- Fight enemies with turn-based combat
- Calculate damage based on stats
- Award XP and gold for victories
- Level up when XP threshold reached

### Technical Requirements:

âœ… **Must Use:**
- Variables, strings, numbers
- If/elif/else
- For and while loops
- Arrays and dictionaries
- Functions with parameters and returns
- JSON for data
- Proper code organization

âœ… **Success Criteria:**
- All 4 systems work correctly
- Clean, readable code
- Functions are well-organized
- Game data uses proper structures
- 150+ lines of code

## Your Quest Begins...

This is YOUR project. Plan it, design it, build it. You have all the knowledge you need!

Good luck, game developer!

solutionCode:
# FINAL PROJECT: Complete RPG System

extends Node

# Character functions
func create_character(name: String, char_class: String) -> Dictionary:
    return {
        "name": name,
        "class": char_class,
        "level": 1,
        "xp": 0,
        "health": 100,
        "max_health": 100,
        "mana": 50,
        "strength": 15 if char_class == "Warrior" else 10,
        "intelligence": 15 if char_class == "Mage" else 10,
        "gold": 100,
        "inventory": []
    }

func level_up_character(char: Dictionary) -> void:
    char["level"] += 1
    char["max_health"] += 20
    char["health"] = char["max_health"]
    char["mana"] += 10
    char["strength"] += 2
    char["intelligence"] += 2
    print("\nðŸŽ‰ LEVEL UP! Now level ", char["level"])

func display_character(char: Dictionary) -> void:
    print("\n" + "="*40)
    print("  ", char["name"], " the ", char["class"])
    print("="*40)
    print("Level: ", char["level"], " | XP: ", char["xp"], "/1000")
    print("Health: ", char["health"], "/", char["max_health"])
    print("Mana: ", char["mana"])
    print("Strength: ", char["strength"], " | Intelligence: ", char["intelligence"])
    print("Gold: ", char["gold"], "g")

func add_item(inventory: Array, item_name: String, item_type: String, value: int) -> void:
    inventory.append({"name": item_name, "type": item_type, "value": value})
    print("Added: ", item_name)

func display_inventory(inventory: Array) -> void:
    print("\n=== INVENTORY ===")
    if inventory.size() == 0:
        print("Empty")
        return
    for item in inventory:
        print("  ", item["name"], " (", item["type"], ") - ", item["value"], "g")

func battle(char: Dictionary, enemy: Dictionary) -> bool:
    print("\nâš”ï¸ BATTLE: ", char["name"], " vs ", enemy["name"])
    var enemy_hp = enemy["health"]
    var turn = 1
    
    while enemy_hp > 0 and char["health"] > 0:
        # Player attacks
        var damage = char["strength"] + (turn % 10)
        enemy_hp -= damage
        print("Turn ", turn, ": You deal ", damage, " damage")
        
        if enemy_hp <= 0:
            print("ðŸŽ‰ Victory!")
            char["gold"] += enemy["reward"]
            char["xp"] += enemy["xp"]
            if char["xp"] >= 1000:
                char["xp"] -= 1000
                level_up_character(char)
            return true
        
        # Enemy attacks
        var enemy_damage = enemy["damage"] + (turn % 5)
        char["health"] -= enemy_damage
        print("Enemy deals ", enemy_damage, " damage")
        
        if char["health"] <= 0:
            print("ðŸ’€ Defeated!")
            return false
        turn += 1
    return true

func _ready() -> void:
    print("="*50)
    print(" RPG SYSTEM - FINAL PROJECT")
    print("="*50)
    
    # Create character
    var player = create_character("Hero", "Warrior")
    display_character(player)
    
    # Add items
    add_item(player["inventory"], "Steel Sword", "weapon", 100)
    add_item(player["inventory"], "Health Potion", "potion", 50)
    display_inventory(player["inventory"])
    
    # Battle
    var goblin = {"name": "Goblin", "health": 50, "damage": 8, "reward": 50, "xp": 300}
    battle(player, goblin)
    
    # Final stats
    display_character(player)
    
    print("\nGame Complete!")
